articles.author: Corrie Pelc
articles.title: Hypertension: Novel drug helped lower blood pressure for 6 month - Medical News Today
articles.description: A single dose of an experimental medication called zilebesiran was safe and effective in lowering blood pressure for 6 month, a study finds.
articles.content: <ul><li>An investigational drug called zilebesiran has been found to be safe and effective in reducing systolic blood pressure in people with mild-to-moderate high blood pressure for up to six months… [+7477 chars]

articles.author: Lindsey Shapiro, PhD
articles.title: Gene linked to movement disorder with Parkinson's-like symptoms - Parkinson's News Today
articles.description: Researchers have uncovered a new movement disorder with Parkinson's-like symptoms caused by mutations in the ACBD6 gene.
articles.content:
Researchers have discovered a new early-onset movement disorder associated with mutations in the ACBD6 gene, and several symptoms are similar to those observed in Parkinson’s disease.
